Name: Devout Druid
Effect: When gathering mana if this unit is on a spring you control you gain one additional mana

Name: Bowman
Effect: If this unit kills another unit you may move it one space

Name: Tranquil Warden
Effect: After this unit takes damage and survives flip it

Name: Siphoner Druid
Effect: When this unit kills another unit gain one mana

Name: Sudden Bloom
Effect: Put up to three common units from your discard pile into empty spaces adjacent to a friendly unit

Name: Mana Bomb
Effect: Deal one damage to a unit. If that unit is on a mana spring deal three damage to it instead

Name: Earth Elemental
Effect: 4M: Play this unit from your discard pile

Name: High Tide Crasher
Effect: 2M: give a friendly unit within two spaces plus one attack this turn. Then flip this unit

Name: Low Tide Drifter (High Tide Crasher Flip)
Effect: 2M: Heal all adjacent friendly units one. Then flip this unit.

Name: Kindling Sparks
Effect: When this unit kills another unit flip it

Name: Gale Elemental
Effect: At the start of your movement phase you may move all units 1 space in the same direction. (Except the ones that don't have space)
